name: Terrors of the Heart
description:
The heart is terror

For the ransom of feeling it holds us to

A visual novel style adaptation of The Tell-Tale Heart, created for Public Domain Jam 2015.

This is the first full game I've made with Ren'Py, so there may be a few rough edges!

Play takes about 5 minutes. I'd recommend headphones on, and the screen can be resized by dragging the bottom right corner.
